column4: im trying to install firefox 1.5, i did everything the ubuntu wiki told me, but whenever i try to make symlinks, ln tells me that the file or directory already exists?
dpkg-divert: `local diversion of /usr/bin/firefox to /usr/bin/firefox.ubuntu' clashes with `local diversion of /usr/bin/firefox to /usr/bin/firefox'
i removed the old diversion..i messed up on the old one
when you do ln -s, which directory comes first?  source?
I GOT IT!! i had to rm the /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/firefox file and ln -s my /opt/firefox/firefox to /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox ... simple
reinstall firefox 1.0.7 and see if it does work anymore
i dont know how i did it wrong
